BBEX3.A.BRL.EUR.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Brazil / EUR 1 = BRL ... (buying)
Source: Since April 2000: Banco Central do Brasil, Brasilia. 1999 - March 2000: Dresdner Bank Lateinamerika AG, Hamburg.
Methodology: Until 2007, calculated on the basis of daily exchange rates, from 2008 to 2011 on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates, and from 2012 on the basis of month-end rates.
